item.title: Writing 2: Syllabus
item.description: Writing 2 Obligatory COVID-19 Message: The pandemic is total bullshit. We’re all struggling through this. But here we are. We might as well try to make the best of it. Use as required. --- Rage Button (NSFW) --- Soothe Button --- Therapy Button --- Prof's Current Jam # TODO - Get readings w/ embedded fonts: Baker, Percy, Freire. - --- Course Description Writing 2 is an introduction to academic writing and research.

Introduction Here is some shit about me and the class and the fucking pandemic shit we are facing. Writing is just goddamn hard. And it is much harder when you are alone and can’t connect with others to give you help. Email and Zoom are pretty fucking terrible substitutes. But, what are you gonna do? No way but through. With a mask. I hate this too. This pandemic is bullshit. I’m not happy.
